instanceVariables.name: PauseTimer
instanceVariables.desc: If ticked. Timer Pauses. Simple enough

instanceVariables.name: TimeAttackMode
instanceVariables.desc: Not quite sure if I'm adding this. Maybe though.

instanceVariables.name: TimeLimiter
instanceVariables.desc: Once the timer hits 0 the player dies.

instanceVariables.name: EnableTimeLimit
instanceVariables.desc: Timer will be stuck on 000 if enabled

instanceVariables.name: CountdownType
instanceVariables.desc: 1 = Moden (timer goes down each second) 0.5 = Classic (timer goes down two times faster like in the original SMW)
